subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: David Moncoutié of France won a mountain finish to take the 11th stage of the Vuelta a España, while Bradley Wiggins marked his full return from injury by claiming the overall lead.
snippet: David Moncoutié of France won a mountain finish to take the 11th stage of the Vuelta a España, while Bradley Wiggins marked his full return from injury by claiming the overall lead.
